Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's Debut and Initial Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces The Human Meteor and his world, starting with the cover reveal and transitioning into his first encounter with danger at the pier.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Premise Setup
sub_scenes.description: The comic cover introduces the main character, The Human Meteor, and sets up the initial premise and underwater setting.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Ride and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Duke starts his day as a taxi driver, gets a fare to the waterfront, and is then pursued and attacked, leading to his transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Pier Justice and Hospital Briefing
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Human Meteor's immediate response to the pier attack, his interaction with the police, and receiving a new mission briefing in the hospital.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Police Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the attackers, deals with them, and then interacts with the arriving police officers.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor receives a briefing in the hospital about a suspicious yacht and the potential capture of G-Man Holden, setting up his next mission.

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Infiltration and Submarine Threat Discovery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Duke/Toby's plan to infiltrate the yacht, his preparations, the infiltration itself, and the discovery of the submarine threat.

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration Planning and Departure
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans his yacht infiltration with a boy, including radio communication, and the yacht departs.

sub_scenes.title: Undercover on Yacht and Submarine Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Toby, undercover as 'Pete', searches the yacht, is captured, but then revealed to be part of a mission, discovering the submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

Major_Arcs.title: Underwater Confrontation and Submarine Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Human Meteor and allied divers' underwater confrontation with enemy divers and the attack on the Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Descent and Allied Divers Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives to the submarine, and allied divers join him from the yacht, preparing for underwater action.

sub_scenes.title: Enemy Activity and Initial Underwater Fight
sub_scenes.description: Enemy divers are loading torpedoes onto the submarine, and Human Meteor engages in underwater combat with them.

Major_Arcs.title: Shipboard Concerns and Yacht Investigation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the surface, dealing with events on the ship and Human Meteor's investigation on the yacht.

sub_scenes.title: Ship's Reaction to Submarine Attack and Peter's Condition
sub_scenes.description: Sailors are worried about Peter's unconscious state on the ship, and the ship reacts to the geyser caused by the torpedo attack.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor Boards Yacht and Peter's Depth Map
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor resurfaces, boards the yacht to investigate, discovers Peter's fate and searches for the depth map.

sub_scenes.title: Depth Map to Navy and Holden's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor informs the Navy about the depth map, visits a recovering Holden, and then takes Toby home.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map
Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and Ambulance Call
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline, introducing the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis, followed by a scene of an ambulance arriving at a house.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads are shown in a firefight against Nazi fiends.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Concern
sub_scenes.description: Two boys observe an ambulance arriving at a house, and paramedics attend to an injured person.

Major_Arcs.title: Wallet Clue and Mr. Horst's Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the boys from the ambulance scene to their encounter with Mr. Horst at the bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Lead
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet at the ambulance scene, leading them to a bus garage address.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Bus Chase and Policeman's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: The boys chase a bus, intending to go to the garage, but are intercepted by a policeman.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return
Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Mr. Horst's Interrogation and Bronson's Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Mr. Horst's interrogation of the boys, his violent plan, and Major Bronson's dramatic intervention to save them.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Violent Plot
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys about the wallet, disbelieves their explanation, and plans to harm them violently.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Intervention and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson intervenes, suggesting a 'better way' to harm the boys, revealing the carbon monoxide plot.

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Capture, and Bronson's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: A fight erupts, the boys are captured, threatened by Mr. Horst, but then Major Bronson turns against Horst's men.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

Major_Arcs.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Nazi Spy Ring Uncovered
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the boys seeking marine help, the attack on the Marine Barracks, and the ultimate resolution of the Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Marine Help and Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: The boys seek marine help, and a car crashes into the Marine Barracks as part of an attack.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Chaos and Nazi Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Chaos at the barracks, Skip defends himself, and Major Bronson faces Nazi attackers.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Intervention and Spy Ring Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Marines intervene, a fight breaks out, Major Bronson is injured but recovers, and the Nazi spy ring is dismantled.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new adventure for Champ and Henry in South America, caught in a web of intrigue and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Intrigue and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are introduced in a desert battle, then the scene shifts to a South American town where Americans are in a hotel.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion and Interrogation of Americans
sub_scenes.description: The presence of Americans in the hotel is confirmed, and they are immediately questioned about their intentions.

sub_scenes.title: Town Under Suspicion and Rosita's Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: Officers interrogate various civilians about Rosita's kidnapping, and Champ and Henry are escorted to the Consul to understand the situation, learning about El Tigre and Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Capture by El Tigre and Mama's House
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are captured by El Tigre and taken to a house where they meet 'Mama', creating a confusing situation.

Major_Arcs.title: Rosita's Rescue Operation and Confrontation with El Tigre
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the plan to rescue Rosita, the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout, and the ensuing combat.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Men plan to approach El Tigre's hideout, infiltrate it using stage dollars as a diversion.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Twist - El Tigre's Innocence
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre is interrogated and reveals he is not involved in Rosita's kidnapping, but is dealing with Axis agents misusing his name.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents

sub_scenes.title: Clarification and Rescue Mission Launch
sub_scenes.description: Misunderstanding about El Tigre is cleared, Rosita's location by Axis agents is revealed, and a rescue mission is launched.

narrative_arcs.title: Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated

sub_scenes.title: Combat and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Close combat ensues, Rosita is rescued, and the Nazi spy ring is defeated.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Torture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his capture, torture, and the extraction of plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights in the jungle, and military officers discuss his situation and disobedience.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, is observed, and another soldier is ambushed and captured by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: The captured soldier is brought to Grauer, suspicions arise about Dolan, and orders are given for torture to extract plans, which is successful.

Major_Arcs.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Dolan's Native Alliance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers arson in the native village, a marine attack, and Devil Dog Dolan forming an alliance with the natives after their chief's death.

sub_scenes.title: Arson and Marine Attack
sub_scenes.description: Arson is confessed and reprimanded, a marine attack is initiated, and plans are made by Grauer post-incident.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Fight and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan surprises and fights natives, the chief accidentally dies, leading to a native homage and alliance with Dolan.

narrative_arcs.title: Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam
Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Dilemma, Son's Rebellion, and Dolan's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the shipboard drama involving the Captain, his son Sam, and Devil Dog Dolan's role in discipline and resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Conflict and Sam's Onslaught
sub_scenes.description: Captain is ordered to surrender plans, his son Sam rebels and attacks sailors and officers.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Disciplinary Spanking
sub_scenes.description: Surrender order is rescinded, Dolan is commended, and disciplines an officer with a spanking.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the banker murder, culminating in Farnacci's capture and a birthday celebration.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and Murder Case
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the banker Robert Burgess's murder.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Barnacci Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Twinkle Twins visit the hospital to investigate, learning about Reilly's sick daughter and developing suspicion against Barnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition

sub_scenes.title: Phone Call to Editor and Reilly Pursuit Begins
sub_scenes.description: Dan calls Elijah, gets confirmation of Barnacci's gang link, reads newspaper confirming details, and they start pursuing Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Information
sub_scenes.description: Search for Reilly in Irish section, meet Mrs. Murphy who reveals Reilly's innocence and Farnacci's blood donation.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat

sub_scenes.title: Reilly's Escape and Armed Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Reilly escapes in a taxi, Dan and Diane pursue, leading to an armed confrontation on cars.

sub_scenes.title: Street Brawl, Police Intervention, and Vehicle Apprehension
sub_scenes.description: A separate street brawl occurs, police intervene, and the vehicles from the chase are apprehended.

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Emergency transport of shooting victim, ambulance ride, hospital arrival, blood transfusion needed, community blood donation drive.

narrative_arcs.title: Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Capture and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Demand for justice, police raid poolroom and arrest Farnacci, followed by a birthday party celebrating Reilly's daughter's recovery, resolving the case.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom
Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
